reviewText:
for all of us die hard dark shadows fan, the only disappointment in this episode was that they did not plan to continue the story. it ties up a lot of loose ends but leaves you with one hell of a cliff hanger.

now if you just have to know what happened, you can always watch the original dark shadows. they used to rent them at blockbuster. that is how i found the continuing story. i hope someone puts this on dvd someday.
If you are into great suspence type shows, don't look any further. The original Dark Shadows series was awsome, but, the revival Dark Shadows totally eclipses it. Buy it, you won't be disapointed.
This video includes additional footage not aired in the original broadcast on NBC.
